para.sentence: The function M_{\kappa,\mu}\left(x+y\right) has the following expansions: e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\mu-\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{ \infty}\frac{{\left(-2\mu\right)_{n}}}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n} \*M_{\kappa-\frac{1}{2}n,\mu-\frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\mu+\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{ \infty}\frac{{\left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu-\kappa\right)_{n}}}{{\left(1+2\mu\right)_{ n}}n!}\left(\frac{y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*M_{\kappa-\frac{1}{2}n,\mu+\frac{1} {2}n}\left(x\right), , e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\kappa}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{ \left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu-\kappa\right)_{n}}y^{n}}{n!(x+y)^{n}}M_{\kappa-n,\mu} \left(x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\frac{1}{2}, , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\mu-\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty }\frac{{\left(-2\mu\right)_{n}}}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*M_{ \kappa+\frac{1}{2}n,\mu-\frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\mu+\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty }\frac{{\left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu+\kappa\right)_{n}}}{{\left(1+2\mu\right)_{n}}n!} \left(\frac{-y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*M_{\kappa+\frac{1}{2}n,\mu+\frac{1}{2}n} \left(x\right), , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\kappa}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{ \left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu+\kappa\right)_{n}}y^{n}}{n!(x+y)^{n}}M_{\kappa+n,\mu} \left(x\right), if \Re((y+x)/x)>\frac{1}{2}.

The function W_{\kappa,\mu}\left(x+y\right) has the following expansions: e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\mu-\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{ \infty}\frac{{\left(\frac{1}{2}-\mu-\kappa\right)_{n}}}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{ \sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*W_{\kappa-\frac{1}{2}n,\mu-\frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\mu+\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{ \infty}\frac{{\left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu-\kappa\right)_{n}}}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{ \sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*W_{\kappa-\frac{1}{2}n,\mu+\frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{-\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\kappa}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{ \left(\frac{1}{2}+\mu-\kappa\right)_{n}}{\left(\frac{1}{2}-\mu-\kappa\right)_{ n}}}{n!}\*\left(\frac{y}{x+y}\right)^{n}W_{\kappa-n,\mu}\left(x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\frac{1}{2}, , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\mu-\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty }\frac{1}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*W_{\kappa+\frac{1}{2}n,\mu- \frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{\mu+\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty }\frac{1}{n!}\left(\frac{-y}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{n}\*W_{\kappa+\frac{1}{2}n,\mu+ \frac{1}{2}n}\left(x\right), if |y|<|x|, , e^{\frac{1}{2}y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{\kappa}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{1} {n!}\left(\frac{-y}{x+y}\right)^{n}W_{\kappa+n,\mu}\left(x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\frac{1}{2}.
To obtain similar expansions for M_{\kappa,\mu}\left(xy\right) and W_{\kappa,\mu}\left(xy\right) , replace y in the previous two subsections by (y-1)x.
